name: First Person Flappy Bird
description:
Have you ever wanted to play Flappy Bird, through the eyes of the bird? In this game you can, while getting chased by a giant cat.

Glamorously glide through pipes and rack up a score, better than your previous best!

Jump to fly between pipes and don't crash, miss a pipe, or get caught by the giant cat that is intimidatingly following you.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

Space to jump/fly
